arts.ttl: Loudmouth Malmo boss in X-rated meltdown as he declares 'obviously I'm stupid' after Rangers taunt backfires
arts.sum: Henrik Rydstrom wasn't pleased after the Swedish champions slumped to Europa League defeat

arts.ttl: Europa League dividend gives Rangers manager Philippe Clement a little credit in the bank
arts.sum: A measure of success in Europe has never prevented the critics from rounding on Rangers managers if all is not going well for them domestically.

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement tells Rangers' fans that the best is STILL to come as boss names his one Malmo gripe
arts.sum: The Light Blues got their Europa League campaign off to the perfect start in Sweden

arts.ttl: How 8 pundits saw Rangers' Europa League start as giddy Kris Boyd books up for Bilbao amid 'bizarre' boardroom probe
arts.sum: The Scottish Premiership side saw off Malmo to kickstart the league phase of the competition

arts.ttl: Ally McCoist has ONE Rangers gripe as legend reacts to impressive win over Malmo
arts.sum: Ally McCoist branded Rangers' 2-0 win over Malmo as their BEST performance in years. It was a night when Rangers recorded their first-ever victory against Swedish opposition and McCoist hopes the morale-boosting result can lift the mood around Ibrox.

arts.ttl: James Tavernier breaks Rangers silence on post Celtic fan abuse as captain insists 'I'm a strong character'
arts.sum: Tavernier was delighted to be able to put smiles back on supporters' faces tonight as he said: "Our fans always require us to win games no matter who it is. Get the latest news sent straight to your messages by joining our Rangers WhatsApp community today.

arts.ttl: Fenerbahce and Rangers win their openers in the revamped Europa League
arts.sum: Fenerbahce opened the revamped Europa League with a 2-1 home win over Belgian club Union Saint-Gilloise with both teams finishing the game with 10 men on Thursday. Defender Çağlar Söyüncü opened the scoring for Jose Mourinho’s team in the 26th with a half-volley from close range and Christian Burgess’ own goal in the 82nd made it 2-0 for Fenerbahce.

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement fumes at Hamza Igamane absence as Rangers boss 'not happy' with Europa League passport woes
arts.sum: The forward was unable to join up with the rest of the team in Sweden due to issues with his passport

arts.ttl: James Tavernier finally breaks silence on Rangers fan backlash as captain faces awkward Celtic question
arts.sum: The skipper was speaking after the win over Malmo - but wasn't allowed to put derby day defeat behind himself just yet

arts.ttl: Rangers pass major test to kick off Europa League with impressive win
arts.sum: Malmo 0-2 Rangers: Nedim Bajrami’s first goal for the club and Ross McCausland’s superb second earned the visitors an important win
